summary: The parents of a girl who was killed by a savage dog are granted the opportunity to spend three days with their deceased daughter.
cast: Aidan Gillen|Eva Birthistle|Timothy Spall|Ella Connolly|Ruth McCabe|Brian Gleeson|Amelia Crowley|Dan Gordon|Tommy McArdle|John McArdle|Aoife Meagher|Siobhán O'Brien|Alice McCrea|Johnny Fortune|John Hand|Darragh Hand|Steven McDonnell|Simple The Bull
title: Wake Wood
